page.title: 10PLAY SPACE IN N.E.WORCESTER
page.content: We play on Brickfields Park.The proper name is King George V Playing Fields.There is a football pitch,a netball pitch,tennis courts and a bowling green.Karen and susan play on Brickies with their dog Sophie.They do a course around the swings and slides.Steven plays football with Gavin and Philip. We all like to play on Gheluvelt Park.Michael plays football and Ashley plays putting.I watch the ducks,and once one came out and nipped my finger.Claire plays on the swings with her brother.The paddling pool is 2 feet deep.You can't paddle in the stream(Barbourne Brook)because it is polluted. I play on the old Samuel Southall field.We get under the fence and play cricket or football.We usually have 2 a side-David and me v Dorje and Simon.
